actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To eliminate attorney fee awards and limit relief available in suits against certain public entities.
short_title: Environmental Litigation Abuse Prevention Act of 1997

summary.text: Environmental Litigation Abuse Prevention Act of 1997 - Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that, in issuing any final order in any action brought pursuant to such Act, the court shall not award litigation costs (including any attorney's fees or expert witness fees) against any municipality (including the District of Columbia).

titles.title: Environmental Litigation Abuse Prevention Act of 1997
To eliminate attorney fee awards and limit relief available in suits against certain public entities.
